00025 #ifndef _TGACodec_H__
00026 #define _TGACodec_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgreImageCodec.h"
00029 #include "OgreSDDataChunk.h"
00030 
00031 namespace Ogre {
00032 
00035     class _OgreExport TGACodec : public ImageCodec
00036     {
00037     protected:
00038 
00039     // We're mapping onto raw file data, so ensure members are packed with no gaps
00040     #if OGRE_COMPILER == COMPILER_MSVC
00041     #pragma pack(push)
00042     #pragma pack(1)
00043     #endif
00044 
00045         struct TgaHeader {
00046             unsigned char  id_len;
00047             unsigned char  cm_type;
00048             unsigned char  type;
00049             unsigned short cm_start;
00050             unsigned short cm_len;
00051             unsigned char  cm_bits;
00052             unsigned short xorg;
00053             unsigned short yorg;
00054             unsigned short width;
00055             unsigned short height;
00056             unsigned char  bpp;
00057             unsigned char  flags;
00058         };
00059     #if OGRE_COMPILER == COMPILER_MSVC
00060     #pragma pack(pop)
00061     #endif
00062 
00063 
00064     public:
00065         void code( const DataChunk& input, DataChunk* output, ... ) const;
00066         CodecData * decode( const DataChunk& input, DataChunk* output, ... ) const;
00067 
00068         String getType() const { return "tga"; }
00069     };
00070 
00071 }
00072 
00073 #endif
